features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Allow users to register, log in, and maintain authentication state.

tasks.title: Implement Registration API
tasks.description: Create /api/auth/register endpoint to register new users.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js route handler (app/api/auth/register/route.ts). Hash passwords using bcrypt. Store user data in in-memory store (React state).

tasks.title: Implement Login API
tasks.description: Create /api/auth/login endpoint for user authentication.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js route handler (app/api/auth/login/route.ts). Compare password hashes. On success, set session/cookie or in-memory auth state.

tasks.title: Build Registration Form
tasks.description: Create RegisterForm component and /register page.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use shadcn/ui form components. Validate input fields. POST to /api/auth/register.

tasks.title: Build Login Form
tasks.description: Create LoginForm component and /login page.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use shadcn/ui form components. Validate input fields. POST to /api/auth/login.

tasks.title: User Context & State Management
tasks.description: Set up Context API and useReducer for authentication state.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create AuthContext. Store user info and authentication status globally. Provide login/logout/register actions.

tasks.title: Protect Routes
tasks.description: Restrict access to /tasks and home page for unauthenticated users.
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement route guards using useContext in page components. Redirect to /login if not authenticated.

tasks.title: Implement Tasks API
tasks.description: Create /api/tasks (GET, POST) and /api/tasks/:id (PUT, DELETE) endpoints.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js route handlers. Store tasks in in-memory array in React state. Filter tasks by userId.

tasks.title: Build Task List Component
tasks.description: Create TaskList component to display all tasks for the current user.
tasks.technicalNotes: Fetch tasks from /api/tasks. Display using shadcn/ui List or Card components. Support loading and empty states.

tasks.title: Build Task Item Component
tasks.description: Create TaskItem component to display individual task details.
tasks.technicalNotes: Show title, description, completed status. Use shadcn/ui elements for styling. Support mark as complete, edit, and delete actions.

tasks.title: Create Task Form
tasks.description: Allow users to add new tasks.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use shadcn/ui form components. POST to /api/tasks. Update state on success.

tasks.title: Edit Task Functionality
tasks.description: Allow users to edit task title, description, and completion status.
tasks.technicalNotes: PUT to /api/tasks/:id. Use modal or inline editing with shadcn/ui.

tasks.title: Delete Task Functionality
tasks.description: Allow users to delete tasks.
tasks.technicalNotes: DELETE to /api/tasks/:id. Confirm deletion with shadcn/ui dialog.

features.name: UI & Navigation
features.description: Consistent, responsive UI and navigation between pages.

tasks.title: Layout Component
tasks.description: Implement app/layout.tsx for shared layout and navigation.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use shadcn/ui Navbar, add links to Home, Tasks, Login, Register, and Logout. Show user info if logged in.

tasks.title: Styling with Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Apply consistent styling across all pages and components.
tasks.technicalNotes: Configure Tailwind CSS. Use utility classes and shadcn/ui for all UI elements.

tasks.title: Responsive Design
tasks.description: Ensure the app is usable on mobile and desktop.
tasks.technicalNotes: Test with different screen sizes. Use Tailwind responsive utilities.

tasks.title: Home Page Implementation
tasks.description: Display TaskList and quick add form on /.
tasks.technicalNotes: Fetch tasks for current user. Show summary (e.g., total tasks, completed).

features.name: State & Data Layer
features.description: Manage app state and data in-memory for demo purposes.

tasks.title: Set Up Global State for Tasks
tasks.description: Use Context API and useReducer to manage tasks.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create TasksContext. Provide actions for add, update, delete, and fetch tasks.

tasks.title: Sync API and State
tasks.description: Ensure API endpoints update the in-memory state correctly.
tasks.technicalNotes: APIs should dispatch actions to update the Context state. Ensure state consistency across components.

tasks.title: Form Validation
tasks.description: Validate all user inputs in forms.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use client-side validation with shadcn/ui and optional server-side validation in API routes.

tasks.title: Unit Tests for Reducers and Context
tasks.description: Write tests for authentication and task reducers.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Jest or React Testing Library. Test state transitions and edge cases.

tasks.title: API Route Tests
tasks.description: Test API endpoints for correct behavior.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use supertest or similar to test Next.js route handlers.
